TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit HttpContentMultipartExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension methods to read MIME multipart entities from instances.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsMimeMultipartContent (this System.Net.Http.HttpContent content);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsMimeMultipartContent(class System.Net.Http.HttpContent content) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function IsMimeMultipartContent (content As HttpContent) As Boolean
static member IsMimeMultipartContent : System.Net.Http.HttpContent -> bool

Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified content is MIME multipart content.
Docs.returns: true if the specified content is MIME multipart content; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsMimeMultipartContent (this System.Net.Http.HttpContent content, string subtype);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsMimeMultipartContent(class System.Net.Http.HttpContent content, string subtype) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function IsMimeMultipartContent (content As HttpContent, subtype As String) As Boolean
static member IsMimeMultipartContent : System.Net.Http.HttpContent * string -> bool

Docs.param: The MIME multipart subtype to match.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified content is MIME multipart content with the specified subtype. For example, the subtype mixed would match content with a content type of multipart/mixed.
Docs.returns: true if the specified content is MIME multipart content with the specified subtype; otherwise, false.

Docs.typeparam: The with which to process the data.
Docs.param: An existing instance to use for the object's content.
A stream provider providing output streams for where to write body parts as they are parsed.
Docs.summary: Reads all body parts within a MIME multipart message using the provided instance to determine where the contents of each body part is written.
Docs.returns: A representing the tasks of getting the result of reading the MIME content.
